function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in energy consumption patterns due to altered habits","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to altered use of shared spaces","Mitigation":"Education and awareness about energy-saving strategies and their impact on disease transmission","Technologies":"Smart energy meters, energy monitoring apps","People":"Household members, building occupants","Owner":"Researchers, building managers"},{"Description":"Omission of household income from the questionnaire","Impact":"Potential bias in economic analysis of homes and inaccurate assessment of energy consumption patterns","Mitigation":"Anonymized collection of income data with consent, use of proxy indicators for income level","Technologies":"Anonymization tools for data collection, statistical modeling techniques","People":"Researchers, survey participants","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Negative spatial perception and mental health effects due to poor housing quality","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and reduced quality of life in occupants","Mitigation":"Improvement of housing quality, access to mental health support services, community awareness programs","Technologies":"Building renovation technologies, mental health support apps","People":"Building occupants, community members","Owner":"Building managers, local authorities"}]}
